resources.string:
What"'"s new in this release
 
 A lot of code to support direct paging from CodeMessaging.net or Active911 made it into this release. Alas, nothing is available for normal users yet.
 
 New Locations:
 Outagamie County, WI
 Winnebago County, WI
 both are links to the Calumet County location which dispatches all 3 counties.
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Lauderdale County, AL
 Windham County, CT
 Anne Arundel County, MD
 Queen Annes County, MD
 Steuben County, NY
 Cumberland County, NC
 Orange County, VA
 
 General fixes:
 
 Check network and roaming status before performing any actions that require network status.
